message: I have 3 years of experience in event management and would love to help with your corporate event. I'm available all day and can handle setup, guest management, and cleanup.
Professional event contractor with food service experience. I can work the full 8-hour shift and have my own transportation.
Available for weekend work. Can help with setup and guest services.
Experienced with trade shows and corporate events. I have my own uniform and can work flexible hours.
